content: Welcome to Chodhry Properties. We are doing property sale purchase for past 10 years. It has been a lot of good days and numerous bad days. And so goes the story of all businesses. But we are trying to make a difference. Through honest, no-hidden back-door dealings, and full customer satisfaction — we are growing each day towards a good future. Contact us if you want to skip the hussle of making a property purchase.

We try to make sure there are no frictions in delivering a transparent solution. But as we move forward, we find that certain terms & conditions provide peace and comfort to both sellers and buyers. Please read these terms and conditions to fully understand the real estate business. Thank You!

page: How to make a property purchse?
content: It is clearly hard to sell / buy property in Pakistan. You need some one who is thoroughly clear about the both parties who is a middle man, that ensures nothing is left un-certain while making a life saving investment. Contact us, and we will try to help you make this investment safely.
